    • Method Detail

      • getUsername

        java.lang.String getUsername()
        Get Username
        Returns:
        Returns a String value for the username of the current player.
        Ensure:
        The username assigned to the current player is retrieved.
        Require:
        The user to set a username for it's player.

      • setUsername

        void setUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Set Username
        Parameters:
        username - The user-defined username for the current player.
        Ensure:
        The current player is assigned to the chosen username.
        Require:
        User-input for the desired username.

      • getFunds

        int getFunds()
        Get Funds
        Returns:
        Returns an integer value the total funds for the defined player.
        Ensure:
        The funds for the current player is retrieved.
        Require:
        A valid number of funds exist for the current player.

      • setFunds

        void setFunds(int funds)
        Set Funds
        Parameters:
        funds - The amount of funds to be added to the current players existing funds.
        Ensure:
        The current user has an updated fund quantity.
        Require:
        A valid player is defined and created. A game must be won or the player is being created in order to set the funds.

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        toString
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Returns a String of the username and an integer of the current funds.
        Ensure:
        The player's username and funds are retrieved.
        Require:
        A player is chosen and information is needed to output.

      • getAllStats

        java.lang.String getAllStats()
        Get All Statistics
        Returns:
        Returns a String of all the statistics for each game.
        Ensure:
        All of the statistics for each game are retrieved.
        Require:
        A player is chosen and the statistics are needed to be shown.

      • getBjWins

        int getBjWins()
        Get Blackjack Wins
        Returns:
        Returns an integer value associated with the total number of blackjack wins for the player.
        Ensure:
        The total number of blackjack wins for the player is retrieved.
        Require:
        A player is chosen and the total win amount is needed, possibly for incrementing statistical information.

      • setBjWins

        void setBjWins(int num)
        Set Blackjack Wins
        Parameters:
        num - The updated number of blackjack wins for a player.
        Ensure:
        A new number of blackjack wins is assigned to the player.
        Require:
        A player to be chosen before setting statistics.

      • getBjLosses

        int getBjLosses()
        Get Blackjack Losses
        Returns:
        Returns an integer value associated with the total number of blackjack losses for the player.
        Ensure:
        The total number of blackjack losses for the player is retrieved.
        Require:
        A player is chosen and the total loss amount is needed, possibly for incrementing statistical information.

      • setBjLosses

        void setBjLosses(int num)
        Set Blackjack Losses
        Parameters:

        Ensure:
        A new number of blackjack losses is assigned to the player.
        Require:
        A player to be chosen before setting statistics.

      • getMmEasySolves

        int getMmEasySolves()
        Get Memory Match Easy Solves
        Returns:
        Returns an integer value associated with the total number of Memory Match easy solves for the player.
        Ensure:
        The total number of easy Memory Match solves for the player is retrieved.
        Require:
        A player is chosen and the total number of solves for Memory Match on easy mode is needed.

      • setMmEasySolves

        void setMmEasySolves(int num)
        Set Memory Match Easy Solves
        Parameters:
        num - The updated number of Memory Match solves on easy.
        Ensure:
        The total number of easy Memory Match solves for the player is adjusted.
        Require:
        A player is chosen and the total number of solves for Memory Match on easy mode is needed to be changed.

      • getMmMediumSolves

        Require:

        Get Simon Says Highest Score

        Ensure:

        Require:
        A player is chosen and the high score for Simon Says is needed.

        Set Simon Says Highest Score
        Parameters:
        ssHighest - The new highest score for Simon Says.
        Ensure:
        The new Simon Says score is updated.
        Require:
        A player is chosen and the high score for Simon Says needs to be updated.

      • getSjWins

        int getSjWins()
        Get Slapjack Wins
        Returns:
        Returns an integer value the total number of Slapjack wins for the current user.
        Ensure:
        The total number of Slapjack wins for the current user is retrieved.
        Require:
        A valid player is selected and the total number of Slapjack wins is needed.

      • setSjWins

        void setSjWins(int num)
        Set Slapjack Wins
        Parameters:
        num - The new number of Slapjack wins to assign for a user.
        Ensure:
        The new number of Slapjack wins is assigned to the user.
        Require:
        A valid player is selected.

      • resetAllStats

        void resetAllStats()
        Reset All Statistics
        Ensure:
        Statistics for all games will be reset back to zero.
        Require:
        A player to be selected in which their statistics are to be reset.
